body: There are no spaces in the path to the data or to the UserObjects folder. It is able to create the files but the files are 0kb. It also creates a gendaymtx.exe file with is only 1kb. I'm wondering if that exe file is functioning properly. Aaaaactually, I just tried running that exe file on its own and got the following error.
